system.description:
Fireform. 1/day as an action, transform yourself into flames for 3 rounds. Ranged attacks do half damage. Creatures using natural weapons also take [[/r 1d4]] damage if they hit. Increase damage die category on duplicate. Emits light to close.

@UUID[Compendium.unnatural-selection.effects.Item.rIxSg9KzDGxbfHJa]{Fireform}
